dmca.title: DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: admin@prozilla.com [mailto:admin@prozilla.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, August 08, 2006 12:58 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA Complaint
Subject: DMCA Complaint
Importance: High



August 8, 2006

Sender Information:
Prozilla Turnkey Websites
SourceSpin
Debra Boniface, Owner/Operating Manager
admin@prozilla.com
1-403-668-9962 or 1-403-921-3229
103-34 Fairways Drive
Airdrie, Alberta T4B2Y5
Canada

Recipient Information:
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 


Sent via: Email
DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
re: [eshopcheap.com (IP 70.86.235.2)] 

Dear George Poletes, Corporate Counsel, 

I, Debra Boniface, owner/operating manager of Prozilla.com Turnkey
Websites, certify under penalty of perjury, that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights. 

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are
not authorized by law for use by the above named domain name owner or
their agents and therefore infringes the copyright owner\'s rights. I
hereby demand that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to
the material or items claimed to be infringing. 

My contact information is as follows:

Prozilla Turnkey Websites
SourceSpin
Debra Boniface, Owner/Operating Manager
admin@prozilla.com
1-403-668-7984 or 1-403-921-3229
103-34 Fairways Drive
Airdrie, Alberta T4B2Y5
Canada


Allegedly Infringing items or materials: 

This website is offering graphics and or script code that is copyright
protected to Prozilla.com and must be removed from your servers. The
websites is offering our products in a download package. 

Infringing material that I demand be disabled or removed in
consideration of the above:
